00813       /*_ Remove a composite.
00814           Every Representation, which was created for the Composite is deleted, by sending a 
00815           RepresentationMessage with type RepresentationMessage::REMOVE.\par
00816           Redraws representations of the parent of the Composite, if wished.
00817           \return bool <tt>true</tt> if the CompositeManager has the Composite
00818       */
00819       bool remove_(Composite& composite, bool update_representations_of_parent = true, 
00820                                          bool to_delete = true);
